detaileddescription.para: This service defines the following Attribute Protocol Application error codes.
Resets the value if the Energy Expended field in the Heart Rate Measurement characteristic to 0.
The values of the Control Point characteristic.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_hrs_client_notify_cb) (struct bt_hrs_client *hrs_c, const struct bt_hrs_client_measurement *meas, int err)
memberdef.argsstring: )(struct bt_hrs_client *hrs_c, const struct bt_hrs_client_measurement *meas, int err)
memberdef.name: bt_hrs_client_notify_cb

detaileddescription.para: This function is called every time the client receives a notification with Heart Rate Measuremet data.

parameterdescription.para: Heart Rate Service Client instance.
Heart Rate Measurement received data.
0 if the notification is valid. Otherwise, contains a (negative) error code.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_hrs_client_read_sensor_location_cb) (struct bt_hrs_client *hrs_c, enum bt_hrs_client_sensor_location location, int err)
memberdef.argsstring: )(struct bt_hrs_client *hrs_c, enum bt_hrs_client_sensor_location location, int err)
memberdef.name: bt_hrs_client_read_sensor_location_cb

briefdescription.para: Heart Rate Body Sensor Location read callback.

parameterdescription.para: Heart Rate Service Client instance.
Body Sensor Location value.
0 if read operation succeeded and data is valid. Otherwise, contains an error code.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* bt_hrs_client_write_cb) (struct bt_hrs_client *hrs_c, uint8_t err)
memberdef.name: bt_hrs_client_write_cb

briefdescription.para: Heart Rate Control Point write callback.

parameterdescription.para: Heart Rate client instance.
0 if write operation succeeded. Otherwise, contains an error code.

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the Heart Rate Service Client.

parameterdescription.para: Heart Rate Service Client instance. This structure must be supplied by the application. It is initialized by this function and will later be used to identify this particular client instance.
If the client was initialized successfully. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Subscribe to Heart Rate Measurement notification.

detaileddescription.para: This function writes CCC descriptor of the Heart Rate Measurement characteristic to enable notification.

parameterdescription.para: Heart Rate Service Client instance.
Notification callback.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Remove subscription to the Heart Rate Measurement notification.

detaileddescription.para: This function writes CCC descriptor of the Heart Rate Measurement characteristic to disable notification.

parameterdescription.para: Heart Rate Service Client instance.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.
Heart Rate Service Client instance.
Read complete callback.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Check if Heart Rate Service has the Body Sensor Location characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: This function can be called after bt_hrs_client_handles_assign to check if the Body Sensor Location characteristic was found during service discovery.

parameterdescription.para: If the Body Sensor Location is found.
If the Body Sensor Location is not found.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_hrs_client *hrs_c, enum bt_hrs_client_cp_value value, bt_hrs_client_write_cb write_cb)
memberdef.name: bt_hrs_client_control_point_write

briefdescription.para: Write Heart Rate Control Point characteristic.

parameterdescription.para: Heart Rate Service Client instance.
Control Point value to write.
Write complete callback.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Check if Heart Rate Service has the Heart Rate Control Point characteristic.

detaileddescription.para: This function can be called after bt_hrs_client_handles_assign to check if the Heart Rate Control Pointcharacteristic was found during service discovery.

parameterdescription.para: If the Heart Rate Control Point is found.
If the Heart Rate Control Point is not found.

briefdescription.para: Function for assigning handles to Heart Rate Service Client instance.

detaileddescription.para: Call this function when a link has been established with a peer to associate the link to this instance of the module. This makes it possible to handle several links and associate each link to a particular instance of this module.

parameterdescription.para: Discovery object.
Heart Rate Service Client instance for associating the link.
If the operation is successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.
